lead_paragraph: Ms. Davis is meditative at Here; Ms. Djordjevich explores mass at the Kitchen; and the Lyon Opera Ballet tries to flout convention at the Joyce.

headline.main: Reviews: Works by Rebecca Davis and Milka Djordjevich, and Lyon Opera Ballet

snippet: Ms. Davis is meditative at Here; Ms. Djordjevich explores mass at the Kitchen; and the Lyon Opera Ballet tries to flout convention at the Joyce.
